room_title: Escape room "Escape a Nuclear Meltdown" by Xcape Branson in Branson
review: The nuclear reactor blew up on us! We did not escape but we had a blast! We loved it!

room_title: Escape room "Escape a Nuclear Meltdown" by Xcape Branson in Branson
review: Took our daughter and 5 friends to do the Nuclear Meltdown for her 13th birthday and it was a blast! Made it through with 7 minutes to spare and saved the world. Yay us! Seriously though, the workers were more than helpful and the kids had a blast afterward in the zoo area.

room_title: Escape room "Escape a Nuclear Meltdown" by Xcape Branson in Branson
review: Our family of 4 came and tried Nuclear Meltdown. It was very fun with several different rooms. Clever clues and everyone had a great time. Staff was wonderful and we can't wait to come back and try another room. Great job making it fully emersive and fun for all ages.
